character.name: Alex
dialogues: Welcome to my space... I hope you enjoy the journey.
This portfolio is a window into my professional and creative world.
I'm passionate about web development and solving complex problems.
Each project here represents hours of dedication and learning.
Ready to explore? Navigate using the side menu.

mainContent.title: Alexis' Background
mainContent.slowText: IT IS A SL_________OW TYPE OF ART

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.text1: Jelou! I am Alex, an ecuadorean 20 year old computer engineer that loves playing around with tech stuff.
presentation.text2: Messing around with everything has always been something I love, tearing down everything in front of me, installing electronic devices, or soldering components to create stuff I like.
presentation.text3: I'm kind of lazy, but I do like to work on my own interests. I love what I'm studying.
